title: ShayLegal
author: ShayLegal
content: Glad to see we are in the last month of the year's last quarter. Interestingly, this also marks the beginning of the festive season where we get to celebrate with loved ones and family. As customary, there are often events hosted in commemoration of the Christmas celebration, where crypto enthusiasts can get to participate to win some rewards.For us wey never buy Christmas clothe and Christmas rice, getting this kind event fit dey helpful. Abeg, make una share any of these festive season events/competitions wey una come across under here. I go drop the ones wey I come across too.

comments.author: Iamcrypticguy
comments.body: Quote from: ShayLegal on December 12, 2023, 08:21:13 AMGlad to see we are in the last month of the year's last quarter. Interestingly, this also marks the beginning of the festive season where we get to celebrate with loved ones and family. As customary, there are often events hosted in commemoration of the Christmas celebration, where crypto enthusiasts can get to participate to win some rewards.For us wey never buy Christmas clothe and Christmas rice, getting this kind event fit dey helpful. Abeg, make una share any of these festive season events/competitions wey una come across under here. I go drop the ones wey I come across too.We all need freebies this Christmas ahaha.. I'll also be on the lookout for replies, especially regarding trading competitions specifically for Africans that I can participate in.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: Quote from: ShayLegal on December 12, 2023, 08:21:13 AMAs customary, there are often events hosted in commemoration of the Christmas celebration, where crypto enthusiasts can get to participate to win some rewards.Majority if these events are scams, there's no father Christmas anywhere who thinks he already had enough to start giving out freely, instead they will use this festive period to accumulate more to their portfolio using various tricks they think could go along way in captivating others, we need to be very careful, some are just a waste of time while some will use that to spy and physh on us for their aimed attack, some of these promotional offers we are seing were actually own strategy to use in getting audience using influencers or promotional offers.

comments.author: Agbamoni
comments.body: If you have any free earning opportunities why do you hod it instead of sharing them in the OP. I was curious when i started reading to see what you would shared at first but i was totally cut off. However, am still expecting it  , Dont wait for others to share theirs before you do. Thats is not the right way to do things. Since you have started this topic we expect your contributions first. Thank you.

comments.author: Obari
comments.created_time: December 12, 2023, 10:46:42 AMLast edit: December 15, 2023, 12:35:08 AM by Obari
comments.body: Quote from: ShayLegal on December 12, 2023, 08:21:13 AMGlad to see we are in the last month of the year's last quarter. Interestingly, this also marks the beginning of the festive season where we get to celebrate with loved ones and family. As customary, there are often events hosted in commemoration of the Christmas celebration, where crypto enthusiasts can get to participate to win some rewards.For us wey never buy Christmas clothe and Christmas rice, getting this kind event fit dey helpful. Abeg, make una share any of these festive season events/competitions wey una come across under here. I go drop the ones wey I come across too.I think there are several opportunities here but sincerely na mostly gambling fit just easily do giveaway but you suppose know say nothing Dey free for this gambling industry because,  e Dey be like cult group wey go use one hand give you something and later use two hands collect but nevertheless try Dey check the games and round thread atleast you fit Dey get better awoof for that side but also try to Dey use your head and no let selfishness and greed hold you.Good luck but Incase you later get better offer no also forget to share with us here because me too like awoof

comments.author: Samlucky O
comments.body: Quote from: ShayLegal on December 12, 2023, 08:21:13 AMAs customary, there are often events hosted in commemoration of the Christmas celebration, where crypto enthusiasts can get to participate to win some rewards.Festive period na one of the best time to stay away from promotional offers or giveaway. There is no free gift anywhere. At first it might be free but second time will not be as lucky as the first time. Just like Doan9269 Said, there is no Father Christmas anywhere. They come with offers that would Leeds you to spending your reserved funds. When something is too good to be true, just stay away. It's better to use your fund and invest in bitcoin and make profit after a period of time. rather than going for such things.

comments.author: Altcoiner007
comments.body: Quote from: Agbamoni on December 12, 2023, 10:05:43 AMIf you have any free earning opportunities why do you hod it instead of sharing them in the OP. I was curious when i started reading to see what you would shared at first but i was totally cut off. However, am still expecting it  , Dont wait for others to share theirs before you do. Thats is not the right way to do things. Since you have started this topic we expect your contributions first. Thank you.I dey tell you. Some title will make you feel you're about to make it in life and then you'll realize na long thing. OP share what you have let's see. Although there are Airdrop events and bounty happening in this space. it's getting the information on time that's the real thing. I missed JTO airdrop. The most painful one was TIP. I followed people to comment tip everywhere but didn't read the instructions on how to connect my account and enter for the reward. Some Exchanges are realiable in bringing rewarding events during festive seasons like this. Last year, I joined Binance Christmas Advant Calendar event. This year, I've seen Africa Christmas Trading Competition that's ongoing & hosted by Bitget. I'm trying to Participate.

comments.author: Miles2006
comments.body: I never see person win money for all this show instead you will still pay money to play and if you're not lucky you might not win any Price, I no dey believe in free thing nothing even dey free again for this life talkless of free money or gift this festive season, even if free gift come do you think they will invite you without paying for ticket.Na because of all this mindset of free money na people dey fall into the hands of scammers, for me personally I never see any event like that this year

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: I no sure say I don see crypto give away for this end of the year. The country self kuku dey hard to the extent wey be say people never begin share rice onto say rice dey expensive. Gift no too dey flow for this year because if na past years at least now wey e be like say month don dey enter half, goodies for don dey show. Moreover for the crypto stuff, hmmm every body dey wait for bulloo, no body want miss am so to dey splash coins give people no go really dey developers agenda.

comments.author: Altcoiner007
comments.body: Quote from: Miles2006 on December 12, 2023, 01:36:03 PMI never see person win money for all this show instead you will still pay money to play and if you're not lucky you might not win any Price, I no dey believe in free thing nothing even dey free again for this life talkless of free money or gift this festive season, even if free gift come do you think they will invite you without paying for ticket.Na because of all this mindset of free money na people dey fall into the hands of scammers, for me personally I never see any event like that this yearShaa E be like una no too dey follow the Airdrop farming things. I don chop giveaway until Like, retweet and comment on Twitter post before o. The fear of scammers fit make u no try some of this opportunities for this Crypto space. The fact say scammers full ground mean say good one dey seriously. Come twitter na.

comments.author: Mayor of ogba
comments.body: Op, nothing dey free for this crypto space, and airdrops no they pay. You topic na crypto earning opportunities this festive season and you hold opportunities you do not want to release it, then who do you want make in release the one in get?  Be careful this festive period scammers will develop fake free earnings of crypto this festive period just to get the opportunity to scam people off their money.QuoteShaa E be like una no too dey follow the Airdrop farming things. I don chop giveaway until Like, retweet and comment on Twitter post before o. The fear of scammers fit make u no try some of this opportunities for this Crypto space. The fact say scammers full ground mean say good one dey seriously. Come twitter na.Do you know how many airdrops wey people don do for this life? Before you see an airdrop that will give you money either you provide help for the project. For instance, you can use your money to provide liquidity, lending people crypto, and farming to stand a chance of being selected for future airdrops.

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: Me I never see that kind festive events for here oh! Though it is good to celebrate the period if something dey but if we won celebrate am how we go do the distribution of the gift or na merits dem dey give? Op you go fit drop the links wey you know make we see how dem do their celebrate in this festive period. In dis naija board na go merits nai I know say we fit give but in other boards dem fit give hardware wallets but we no fo fit get all those things here dey dam five away. Or op are saying we go give Bitcoin as the reward to the winners? And if na like dat, Satoprincess e get something like so you can contact her to plan something out from that if her thread.Happy Christmas in advance to all Nigeria christians and Muslims brothers here.

comments.author: Jegileman
comments.body: Quote from: ShayLegal on December 12, 2023, 08:21:13 AMGlad to see we are in the last month of the year's last quarter. Interestingly, this also marks the beginning of the festive season where we get to celebrate with loved ones and family. As customary, there are often events hosted in commemoration of the Christmas celebration, where crypto enthusiasts can get to participate to win some rewards.For us wey never buy Christmas clothe and Christmas rice, getting this kind event fit dey helpful. Abeg, make una share any of these festive season events/competitions wey una come across under here. I go drop the ones wey I come across too.When I first see the title of your post, I think say you get free tips on how people go get free crypto earning dis December but after I read your thread, I come see say you dey ask for forum how dem fit take get dis kind platforms to earn free crypto dis festive season.One thing wey I want make you know be say, nothing dey for free and if you set depend on free something always you go come meet up with scam wey go really affect you and d trust wey you get for dis crypto industry. Make we channel our energy on how to make better money from our small skills wey we get instead of depending on awoof wey go dey target on how to scam us rather than us building on our skills acquired.

comments.author: DubemIfedigbo001
comments.body: You dey find free thing without investing?. I dey laugh you seriously, make I reason you the Koko, most Christmas bonus offers you'll see recently are just discounted service in crypto organizations and for others that you'll see advertising giveaways, if you see the kind task you go complete before them fit  add you to those wey qualify to be considered for those prizes, you go run and nobi say you oin win ooo, then go still compare you with others wey don complete their tasks too. You fit just suffer for nothing at the end of everything. Me I no dey find a woof again ooo cos these guys sabi use person play.

Some Exchanges are realiable in bringing rewarding events during festive seasons like this. Last year, I joined Binance Christmas Advant Calendar event. This year, I've seen Africa Christmas Trading Competition that's ongoing & hosted by Bitget. I'm trying to Participate. Don't feel sad, dude; most of my friends, including me, missed the $JTO airdrop. However, we need to go on since Christmas is here, and every Christmas brings us new events & opportunities. Along with several big projects, exchanges like Binance, KuCoin, Bitget, Gate_io, and others also offer many exciting events for their users. So I am preparing to hunt them. Earlier, you mentioned the Christmas trading event: is this open to all or only for the new African users?

This year, I've seen Africa Christmas Trading Competition that's ongoing & hosted by Bitget. I'm trying to Participate. Abeg you fit shed more light about the Christmas event for Bitget? If the participation process no too hard I no go mind participate o. How can one participate in it bro/sis ?It's just to register with the event link and hold at least 30 USDT balance in your account on the exchange to participate in the competition. The least person fit win like $100 that's 200 BGB (the exchange native token). My joining is because aside the Overall winner, 30 other runner ups opportunities are made available.Just Google it: Bitget Africa Christmas Trading Competition.  You should find the event link.

comments.author: Pokapoka124
comments.body: Shuoo OP which one be your own?? Na click bait be this. You come dey leave person for air like say you be winch. As you talk the talk well you suppose end am well. If you know of any event wey dey hapun for area you go suppose drop am here abi you want people dey dm you for special information. Sha nor carry this character go general board cos the reaction you go get you fit nor like am.

Meanwhile, na the Bitget African Trading Competition I been the refer to. The criteria to participate dey very easy. You just need hold about $30 USDT and participate in futures trades. Here's a link to the landing page; https://www.bitget.com/ctc?id=444d0882ee5f5987be6b8ccc510beb8b
